Message:
Two have the same
peach colored hair—

the energetic Rean,
and the quiet, gentle Priscilla.

And the third is a slightly
older girl that came from
outside the village—Skuld.

The ever knowledgable Skuld
taught Priscilla and I about
a variety of things.

Rean and I always used to
chase after one another, too.

The four of us would go
exploring in the forest...

and then get scolded by
Skuld’s sisters.

It may have only been
a few years...

but we felt like
the closest of sisters.
